issue.title: [C++] Override DataType::Equals for other types with additional metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-451](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-451). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `DataType::Equals` only compares child fields (if any), but does not compare any other subtype metadata

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-451?focusedCommentId=15884968) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 350
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/350>
